title: Random Swim
description: Allows an entity to randomly move through water.

avoid_surface.description: If true, the mob will avoid surface water blocks by swimming below them.
avoid_surface.title: Avoid Surface

interval.description: A random value to determine when to randomly move somewhere. This has a 1/interval chance to choose this goal
interval.title: Interval

xz_dist.description: Distance in blocks on ground that the mob will look for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1
xz_dist.title: XZ Distance

y_dist.description: Distance in blocks that the mob will look up or down for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1
y_dist.title: Y Distance
